description: Ryuuzaki Sumire is the coach of Seigaku`s tennis club, as well as one of the school`s maths teachers. It was thanks to her that Echizen Nanjirou was able to develop his skills. She is the grandmother of Sakuno. She also has a sort-of rivalry with her ex-mentor, Banda Mikiya a.k.a. Banji, who is the coach for Yamabuki. She is always there to yell, but is also considered to be a great and reliable coach.
name: Ryuuzaki Sumire
